column2: PART 2: STORAGE AND POST-HARVEST/What kind of storage methods do you use?/Hermetic bag
column3: PART 2: STORAGE AND POST-HARVEST/Have you received training on hermetic bag?
column4: PART 7: SOCIAL CAPITAL AND NETWORKING/What is your/partner's role in the group/institution?
column5: PART 7: SOCIAL CAPITAL AND NETWORKING/Think about the people you know in your village. In a typical week, how many times do you communicate with each person you know? The way of communication (in-person or phone) does not matter.
column6: PART 7: SOCIAL CAPITAL AND NETWORKING/Think about the last 10 discussions you had with contacts in your village. In how many discussions were hermetic storage bags mentioned?
column7: PART 7: SOCIAL CAPITAL AND NETWORKING/Now think about people you know that donâ€™t live in your village. In a typical week, how many people outside your village do you communicate with? Include all relatives, friends, traders, extension officers and other people. The way of communication (in-person or phone) does not matter.
column8: PART 7: SOCIAL CAPITAL AND NETWORKING/Think about the last 10 discussions you had with contacts outside of your village. In how many discussions were hermetic storage bags mentioned?
